61: Global Product Control Specialized Accounting Lead We are seeking an outstanding candidate to serve as the Global Product Control Specialized Accounting Lead. The Global Product Control Specialized Accounting Lead is a senior management level position responsible for ensuring the completeness, accuracy and integrity of the firm s books and records related to specialized activities including but not limited to balance sheet netting. Responsibilities: Recruit, manage and develop a team of dedicated subject matter experts in specialized accounting activities with a primary and immediate focus on balance sheet netting Identify, design and implement robust controls to ensure consistent application of FASB accounting rules and reduce financial reporting risk related to specialized accounting topics Partner with senior managers in Controllers, inclusive of Policy and Governance teams, to clarify around roles and responsibilities, thereby improving accountability Actively engage with key stakeholders across the organization including Accounting Policy, Regulatory Reporting and legal entity controllers to ensure the completeness and accuracy of financial, regulatory and management reporting Serve as the team s primary liaison for coordination of internal and external audit inquiries Primary Product Control representative as a key stakeholder in discussions around strategic solutions related to specialized accounting topics Qualifications: 10+ years of finance experience in a related role Public accounting or accounting policy experience is strongly preferred In-depth knowledge of Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB) accounting rules for balance sheet netting Demonstrated ability to digest complex accounting rules and practical application of the same to the firm s financial statements Education: Bachelor s degree in accounting or related field CPA license preferred We are currently working on a hybrid schedule consisting of 2-3 days in office and the remainder remote (specific details depend on location and business group) and may be subject to change.
